title: The Blue Lagoon Soundtrack
description:
The Blue Lagoon Soundtrack
Mincan, The Pirate Bay

FLAC files ripped from my authentic purchased CD using dBpoweramp CD Ripper.

Composed and Conducted by Basil Poledouris, performed by The Australian Symphony Orchestra. Album released in 1980. Album art included.
